summary: This makes the Greybeard armor (what Arngeir wears :p) wearable for the player and also you can find it in High Hrothgar, also there\'s an enchantment on it now.
descriptionHtml:
This is a very simple mod that just makes the Greybeard armor (without this mod it can only be equipped from the console and not seen in inventory) wearable for the player, also it\'s enchanted now. Female compatible.

[b] [u] [color=green] You can find it in High Hrothgar, on the altar where Arngeir usually prays (short to the entrance) [/b] [/u] [/color]

[u] There are three parts of armor in the Greybeard set: [/u]
[color=red] Greybeard\'s Boots [/color]
Enchantment: same as Savior\'s Hide
Rating: 7
Weight: 2
Value: 150

[color=red] Greybeard\'s Hood [/color]
Enchantment: same as Nightweaver\'s Band
Rating: 13
Weight: 1
Value: 150

[color=red] Greybeard\'s Robes [/color]
Enchantment: same as Morokei (Dragon Priest mask)
Rating: 26
Weight: 6
Value: 500

Sorry for bad English, i\'m Dutch :p
This is my first mod, so be kind, i can\'t yet work with creation kit very good, but i begin to get it and i learn everyday :p
author: Ini8465
